dct_description_sm: American Geographical Society of New York. Companion text: Map of the World Distribution of Plague / Jacques M. May. New York, NY: American Geographical Society of New York. Geographical review. Vol. 42 no. 4. 1952. 628-630 pp. Alternate title on verso: World distribution of plague. On upper right margin: Atlas of distribution of diseases - plate 4. Maps: [North America] -- [South America] -- [Africa] -- [Europe, Asia, and Australia] -- [World (1:90,000,000]. To accompany: Geographical review, vol. 42, no. 4, 1951. Text availabe internet web site: http://www.jstor.org/journals/00167428.html or Call no.: 1000.122.2.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : American Geographical Society, 1952.
